basic.name: Sturdy
basic.description: grants immunity to the poisoned status.

basic.name: Strong
basic.description: grants immunity to the enraged status.

basic.description: grants resistance to earth damage.

basic.description: grants resistance to bolt damage.

basic.description: grants resistance to poison damage.

basic.name: Monks
basic.description: grants resistance to physical damage.

basic.name: Flamewalker
basic.description: grants immunity to fire damage.

basic.name: Forestwalker
basic.description: grants immunity to earth damage.

basic.description: grants immunity to ice damage.

basic.name: Windwalker
basic.description: grants immunity to air damage.

basic.name: Stormwalker
basic.description: grants immunity to bolt damage.

basic.name: Shadowwalker
basic.description: grants immunity to dark damage.

basic.name: Sunwalker
basic.description: grants immunity to light damage.

basic.name: Poisoners
basic.description: grants immunity to poison damage.

basic.name: Shielded
basic.description: gives +1 to Defense & Magic Defense.

basic.name: Physicians
basic.description: grants immunity to all status effects.

basic.name: Magical
basic.description: targets Magic Defense instead of Defense.

basic.name: Beast Hunter
basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to beasts.

basic.name: Construct Hunter
basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to constructs.

basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to demons.

basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to elementals.

basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to monsters.

basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to plants.

basic.name: Undead Hunter
basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to undead.

basic.name: Humanoid Hunter
basic.description: deals 5 extra damage to humandoids.

basic.name: Piercing
basic.description: ignores resistances.

basic.name: Multi
basic.description: gives attacks with this weapon Multi(2).

basic.name: Maiming
basic.description: causes slow on hit.

basic.name: Dazzling
basic.description: causes daze on hit.

basic.name: Horrifying
basic.description: causes shaken on hit.

basic.name: Debilitating
basic.description: causes weak on hit.

basic.name: Poisoning
basic.description: causes poisoned on hit.

basic.name: Intimidating
basic.description: causes enraged on hit.
gives a +4 bonus to initiative.
gives a +1 bonus to accuracy checks.
gives a +1 bonus to magic checks.
when you recover HP, you recover 5 extra HP.
spells you cast that restore HP, restore 5 extra HP.
spells you cast deal 5 extra damage.
melee weapon attacks deal 5 extra damage.
ranged weapon attacks deal 5 extra damage.

basic.name: Mythril
basic.description: gives +1 to Magic Defense.

basic.name: Adamant
basic.description: gives +1 to Defense.

aerial.name: Whirlwind
aerial.description: deals 5 extra damage during the first round of conflict.

aerial.name: Finesse
aerial.description: can be used in the off-hand for two-weapon fighting, regardless of category.

aerial.name: Switch
aerial.description: allows you to perform the EQUIP action for free when you hit one or more creatures.

aerial.name: Skybreaker
aerial.description: grants immunity to damage dealt by flying creatures.

aerial.name: Polarized
aerial.description: halves the MP cost of spells targeting a creature suffering from slow.

aerial.name: Slipstream
aerial.description: deals 5 extra damage to a creature when you damage a creature outside of your turn in a conflict.

thunderous.name: Spiked
thunderous.description: gives one ally you can see the option to take their turn immediately after yours, when you deal bolt damage to a creature.

thunderous.name: Shockwave
thunderous.description: causes all enemies present in the scene to suffer dazed, when damage dealt by this weapon put an enemy into crisis.

thunderous.name: Livewire
thunderous.description: grants【half your level in the Elementalist Class】as extra damage to your Cataclysm Skill.

thunderous.name: Conductor’s
thunderous.description: causes the target of your Encourage Skill to recover extra HP equal to【half your level】.

thunderous.name: Jolted
thunderous.description: deals 5 bolt damage to a creature that hits you with a melee attack.

thunderous.name: Overcharged
thunderous.description: causes each target of this weapon to lose 20 MP on a successful hit, if at least one of them is shaken.

paradox.name: Temporal
paradox.description: deals 5 extra damage as long as you have one other weapon equipped of a different category.

paradox.name: Anomalous
paradox.description: grants you the effects of the Mirror spell at the beginning of a conflict scene.

paradox.name: Bound
paradox.description: tethers up to 2 targets hit by this weapon. When either target loses HP from damage they are Vulnerable to, the other loses 5 HP.

paradox.name: Distorted
paradox.description: empowers a spell to deal 5 extra damage when it hits with critical success.

paradox.name: Echoing
paradox.description: causes an enemy in the scene to suffer a random status effect (1d4: dazed, shaken, slow, or weak), when that enemy heals from one or more status effects.

paradox.name: Faded
paradox.description: causes enemies hit by this weapon to fade. If a fading enemy would recover HP, instead they recover no HP and stop fading.

terrestrial.name: Earthward
terrestrial.description: grants resistance to damage caused by environmental hazards.

terrestrial.name: Deeproot
terrestrial.description: recovers 5 additional HP when you recover HP while in crisis.

terrestrial.name: Trembling
terrestrial.description: recovers MP equal to its HR when you hit a creature with this weapon.

terrestrial.name: Blooming
terrestrial.description: grants resistance to physical damage until the start of your next turn when you heal an ally in a conflict.

terrestrial.name: Runestone
terrestrial.description: gives a +2 bonus to Magic Checks for Elementalism Rituals with a total MP cost equal to or less than 60.

terrestrial.name: Spinebreaker
terrestrial.description: causes any equipped heavy or spear weapon to deal 5 extra damage.

ardent.name: Dancing
ardent.description: halves the MP cost of your Bladestorm Skill when using this weapon.

ardent.name: Shadowfire
ardent.description: allows you to change the damage type of your Shadow Strike skill to fire instead of dark at will.

ardent.name: Cauterized
ardent.description: deals 1 extra damage for every status effect you are suffering from.

ardent.name: Bonded
ardent.description: restores 5 MP when you invoke a bond during any check.

ardent.name: Silencing
ardent.description: prevents a creature from taking the Spell action during their next turn when successfully hit.

ardent.name: Rapidfire
ardent.description: causes any equipped bow or firearm weapon to deal 5 extra damage.

glacial.name: Frostbitten
glacial.description: deals 5 ice damage to every enemy present in the scene when you enter Crisis for the first time.

glacial.name: Niveous
glacial.description: makes Ice damage you deal ignore Immunities and Resistances.

glacial.name: Rimebound
glacial.description: causes each creature in the scene suffering weak to lose 5 HP at the start of your turn in a conflict.

glacial.name: Brumal
glacial.description: gives a +1 bonus to DEF and M.DEF against attacks and offensive spells from enraged creatures.

glacial.name: Boreal
glacial.description: causes a creature to suffer slow, or lose 10 MP if already slowed when you deal ice damage to it.

glacial.name: Gelid
glacial.description: deals 5 extra damage to creatures suffering from the weak status effect.

spiritual.name: Anima
spiritual.description: heals you from a single status effect of your choice when you end your turn merged with an Arcanum.

spiritual.name: Aetheric
spiritual.description: deals 1 extra damage for each Bond of affection you have.

spiritual.name: Auroral
spiritual.description: causes damage you deal to ignore resistance as long as you are affected by a spell with the scene duration.

spiritual.name: Spellbound
spiritual.description: applies all Accuracy Check bonuses to your Magic Check instead when using the Spellblade skill with this weapon.

spiritual.name: Vitalis
spiritual.description: heals an ally for 5 HP when you perform the Guard action and choose to cover that ally.

spiritual.name: Sylvan
spiritual.description: grants resistance to dark, light, and poison damage.

corrupted.name: Tarnished
corrupted.description: causes dark damage dealt by a spell using the Spellblade skill ignore Immunities and Resistances.

corrupted.name: Psychic
corrupted.description: treats the M.DEF of targets of your offensive spells as being equal to their WLP die.

corrupted.name: Withering
corrupted.description: makes Dark and poison damage you deal ignore Immunities and Resistances.

corrupted.name: Malicious
corrupted.description: halves the total MP cost of spells targeting a creature you have a Bond of hatred towards.

corrupted.name: Overlord's
corrupted.description: grants a +1 to DEF and M.DEF against attacks and offensive spells from shaken creatures.

corrupted.name: Wraith
corrupted.description: inflicts the poisoned status on the target of your Counterattack skill.

aquatic.name: Coral
aquatic.description: allows you to treat your DEX as being one die higher until the end of your next turn when you reduce an enemy to 0 HP.

aquatic.name: Barnacled
aquatic.description: treats the DEF score of each target of this weapon as being equal to their current MIG die size.

aquatic.name: Boreal
aquatic.description: recovers an amount of HP equal to the HR of a successful Magic Check when you cast an offensive spell.

aquatic.name: Maleable
aquatic.description: prevents attacks with this weapon from triggering counterattacks or other reactive skills.

aquatic.name: Spring
aquatic.description: causes any ally that regains full HP to recover 5 MP as well.

aquatic.name: Misty
aquatic.description: allows you to reduce the damage of a creature hit with this weapon by the HR of its last recorded hit.

mechanical.name: Thief's
mechanical.description: allows you to spend your opportunity to earn 100z.

mechanical.name: Breaching
mechanical.description: gives a +2 to your accuracy check when you use the Breach skill with this weapon.

mechanical.name: Alchemist's
mechanical.description: allows you to choose the area and effect of a potion you create using Gadget (Alchemy), if at least 2 dice show the same number.

mechanical.name: Magnetic
mechanical.description: deals 5 additional damage to creatures with traits related to metal.

mechanical.name: Bard's
mechanical.description: earns you【200 x SL】worth of zenit when you use the Tavern Talk skill.

mechanical.name: Energized
mechanical.description: deals 5 extra bolt damage when you hit two or more creatures in a single turn with this weapon.
